chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My iPhone 12 product has the above problem.
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

Jiaxu Shen expressed their wish to cancel the order 40635524.  

Can you please immediately stop the shipping and issue a refund?  

If the package has already been dispatched, please contact the shipping provider directly and ask that they stop the delivery and return the parcel to your warehouse. 

That will enable you to get the product back faster. 

You can refund the customer as soon as the shipping provider confirms that the delivery was averted to optimize customer satisfaction.

Please note that you have 48h to refund once the tracking confirms that the package is being returned to your warehouse.  

Please let us know the package’s status under 24h so we can inform the customer of the next step.  

Thanks a lot for your help!

Regards,
Olga from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the cancellation of the order. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare, 

The refund has been made. 

Regards, 
RK

Dear ecomobile

Thank you.

Have a great day.

Regards,
Olga from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, 

Kindly close the case if no further assistance is required to avoid affecting the KPI of "Long Term Contact Rate". Please click the “close/to enclose” button located at the bottom right. 

Thank you.
Regards,
SY
